ensemble.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a small group of musicians, actors, or dancers who perform together regularly
ensemble.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a set of things that go together to form a whole
ensemble.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a set of clothes that are worn together
ensemble.translation[0].note_box[0].item: Ensemble is usually followed by a singular verb
The jazz ensemble has played all over Europe
